attributes.action: not to bail out any Eurozone countries whihich cannot stick to the  Euro rules.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Certain European countries such as Spain, Portugal  Greece and to a lesser extent Italy have been breaking Eurozone rules by false accounting, etc. Britain is already in debt and having to bail out other countries debt would be an an extra cost on the tax payer.
